job_title: Life Skills Coach in Newton, MA
pros: Great staff and flexibility for life
cons: poor pay and terrible leadership from managers

job_title: Case Manager/Life Skills Coach in Newton, MA
pros: The Price Center is a very welcoming and friendly place. There is a very strong positive environment feeling. They take the safety of all clients and employees seriously.
cons: Communication can be an issues sometimes. Information isn't always relayed to every party involved.
Lack of communication, mentor, support for growth

job_title: Life Skills Coach in Newton, MA
pros: Wonderful program and people, I'm excited to work here!
cons: Right now the only downside is that it is remote but it's understandable

pros: Clients, colleagues, get to make a difference in clients lives, COVID pay was very good.
cons: Horrible upper management, they are highly critical and create a toxic work environment! Extremely high turnover due to poor agency decisions. Not enough staff to properly maintain the homes. The list goes on and on.........

pros: I loved working at the Price Center because of the staff and clients. All the people there were wonderful. We also got plenty of vacation time and benefits and annual raises. It is far from a desk job- half of most days are spent out in the community at parks or playing sports.
cons: As a non-profit, our Christmas bonus was a 50 dollar gift card and there are rarely company events. Communication between the head bosses and staff can be confusing and contradictory. Pay is low, but that's to be expected in this feild. It can be hard to get the vacation days that you want, especially around holidays when everyone is requesting. Dealing with some clients behaviors can be very challenging.

review_title: I love working in Residential and would highly recommend!!
job_title: Residential Case Manager in Newton, MA
pros:
Fun outings to museums, Boston, parks, restaurants, etc.
Working for amazing and fun individuals.
Awesome management, no other company can compare.
cons: Compensation, but still comparable to other agency's.

pros: Staff are friendly and helpful.  Working with clients is rewarding.   Good benefits.
cons: None that I can think of
